channel.title: CVE Feed for Honeywell -- C300
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Honeywell -- C300

item.title: CVE-2023-5407|2024-07-09T19:38:30.357Z -- honeywell -- c300
item.description:
Controller denial of service due to improper handling of a specially crafted message received by the controller.
See Honeywell Security Notification for recommendations on upgrading and versioning.

item.title: CVE-2023-5392|2024-04-25T16:53:35.336Z -- honeywell -- c300
item.description: C300 information leak due to an analysis feature which allows extracting more memory over the network than required by the function. Honeywell recommends updating to the most recent version of the product. See Honeywell Security Notification for recommendations on upgrading and versioning.
